Clarence Bennett

  1. Foster Name: Clarence
  2. Foster Family: Waldemar and Elizabeth Johnson
  3. Foster Family Alt: Waldemer; Waldemara
  4. Location of Family: Phelps County, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Holdrege, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 3
  8. Date of Birth: 1902-04-14, Ellenville, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1967-11-08, Kearney, NE
  10. Gender: male
  11. Spouse Name: Julia Jensen
  12. Source: Archives DB - Clients; Phelps Co. Cem. Book; 1920 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex.
